title: Common Gambling Games That Are Still Popular Today (Gambling consultancy)
text: By Gambling consultancy Oct 17, 2015 Among all the games that are played all over the world, gambling is the more favorite one. The basic aspect of gambling is that you can play any game you wish, but it has to involve monetary transactions in content to winning and losing. Therefore, ludo, chess or carom cannot also be transformed into gamble if you introduce monetary rewards in it. Nevertheless, it cannot be ruled out completely that some specific games like Roulette, Bingo, etc. are popular as gambling games. If you are new to the world of gambling, you might wish to know more about these gambling specific games, the method in which they are played and other vital Gambling Statistics. We have some information to share with you. Watch out. BingoAs e have already notified, Bingo is one of the popular gambling games. The basic rule of this game is that the players have to match the numbers in the cards that they have in their hands with that of the numbers that have been picked up randomly. In addition, there is a specific pattern that each of the players is supposed to create. The person who creates this pattern first is declared as the winner. KenoThis game is more like that of lottery. A card is circulated among each of the participants that are in serial numbers of 1 to 80. Each of the players is then asked to select twenty randomly picked numbers along with a wage. This process initiates the game. According to the Casino Statistics , the strategy of the game is to match as many numbers as possible that each player has in his hand. The win is the person who matches maximum number of cards.BaccaratThis is one of the hot favorite games played by gamblers. The player has to select among three of the options, which are Tie, Player and Banker. After all the players place their bets, the dealers starts dealing with two cards in hand. Here, one of the hands is considered as that of the Banker and the other hand is that of the player. In this manner, the dealer keeps on adding up his hands until the number comes to ten cards. This tenth card is considered as Baccarat, and one set of game ends whenever this limit is reached. Wheel of FortuneThis is one of the oldest forms of gambling games. Moreover, this is still popular in a number of casinos all over the world. The central point of this game is a wheel that is structurally divided into 52 smaller sections and a pointer. Each player is asked to select a specific number among the six numbered balls that are placed over the table before the game starts. According to the rules of this game, the wheel of fortune starts when the wheel is rotated. Similarly, it ends when it stops automatically. After the wheel stops, the player whose chosen number is found to rest adjacent to the pointer is declared as the winner of the game. About the Author
